rows.label: tlk45320151_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Hadashal Palace isn't just the
imperial residence, it's also Alba
Margen's best-defended stronghold.

rows.label: tlk45320151_01_msg0002
rows.name:
If you visit the uppermost
floor, you'll be able to see
the gigantic cannonports.

rows.label: tlk45320151_01_msg0003
rows.name:
The elevators to the left and
right will take you up there,
if you're interested.
